content: the beautiful busy bees cushion by esme crick is made in scheepjes catona this cushion is one of many designs published by scheepjes in their yarn - the after party booklets released with a new design every 2 weeks also available in print form scheepjes stockists **yarn requirements** scheepjes catona 100% mercerized cotton 50g/125m * yarn a 248 champagne x 5 balls * yarn b 189 royal orange x 2 balls this crochet pattern is suitable for intermediate crocheters and contains a written pattern and mosaic crochet chart the pattern is available as a digital download in dutch german spanish swedish french and english uk and us terms the pattern is also available as a hardcopy booklet in dutch uk english swedish and german available from scheepjes retailers
